transcript:
[Ringing]
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Ha sir suniye main na thoda bahar nikli hu aap mujhe 4 baje call kar sakte ho kya main thoda aaram se baat kar paungi.
Executive: Theek hai main aapko 4 baje call karunga mam ye bata raha hu ki main aapka ticket close kar de raha hu yaha se theek hai na.
Customer: Ha main aapko feedback provide kar dungi.
Executive: Email pe jayega feedback to usme aapko option aayega jo bhi valuable hoga satisfy ho gaya us number pe jayega.
Customer: Ji ji main aapko ha ha aapko bata dungi theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai 4 baje tak.
Customer: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer requested a call back at 4 PM due to being outside.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to call back at 4 PM.

- Executive will close the ticket.

- Customer will provide feedback via email.



Next Steps: 

Issue not resolved. Executive will call back at 4 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

callback, feedback, ticket closure
